category_label: Soil Health, Micronutrient & Fertilizer Subsidy Schemes

schemes.name: Soil Health Card Scheme
schemes.description: Provides soil testing, nutrient analysis and crop-wise fertilizer recommendations to improve soil fertility and yield.
schemes.benefits: Improved soil fertility, higher crop yields and informed fertilizer use.
schemes.eligibility: All farmers with cultivable land eligible through soil testing campaigns.
schemes.how_to_apply: District Agriculture Office / Soil Testing Labs

schemes.name: Distribution of Micronutrients & Soil Amendments (Karnataka)
schemes.department: Department of Agriculture, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Provides subsidy support for micronutrients, zinc sulphate, gypsum and lime for improving soil fertility and crop response.
schemes.benefits: Enhanced soil nutrient balance and better crop response.
schemes.eligibility: Farmers with soil test deficiency identified through SHC or departmental assessments.
schemes.how_to_apply: Raitha Samparka Kendra / District Agriculture Office

schemes.name: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana – Soil Health & Organic Inputs
schemes.description: Promotes soil organic carbon improvement through composting, bio-inputs and natural nutrient cycling.
schemes.benefits: Enhanced organic soil health and sustainable nutrient management.
schemes.eligibility: Farmers enrolled in PKVY organic clusters.

schemes.name: Lime / Gypsum Distribution for Problem Soils (Karnataka)
schemes.department: Department of Agriculture, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Provides subsidised lime and gypsum for reclamation of saline, alkaline and acidic soils to improve productivity.
schemes.benefits: Reclaimed problem soils, better productivity and soil balance.
schemes.eligibility: Farmers in notified soil-affected regions based on soil lab reports.

schemes.name: National Mission for Sustainable Agriculture – Soil Health Management
schemes.description: Supports soil health improvement, integrated nutrient management and adoption of sustainable farming practices.
schemes.benefits: Sustainable soil management and improved farm productivity.
schemes.eligibility: Farmers in notified districts under NMSA programmes.

schemes.name: Balanced Fertilizer & Nutrient Management Support (Karnataka)
schemes.department: Department of Agriculture, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Provides crop-wise fertilizer usage advisories based on soil test results and field demonstrations.
schemes.benefits: Efficient fertilizer use and optimized crop nutrient management.
schemes.eligibility: Farmers having soil testing records or SHC recommendations.
